definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
pedophile (slang, referring to the case of a Hong Kong child abductor who lured girls with the prospect of seeing "goldfish" in his apartment)

sentences.english: Operators want the most exciting scenes of the small feeding of goldfish .
sentences.chinese: 最为精彩的要算小金鱼吃食的场面了。

sentences.english: In May, people tour the Gold Fish Pond, offer incense at Zhongding and the Yaowang (God of Medicines) Temple.
sentences.chinese: 五月游金鱼池，中顶进香，药王庙进香。

sentences.english: Sharky has just celebrated his 24th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 小金鱼鲨奇刚刚庆祝了24岁生日。

sentences.english: I like walking on the stone steps beside the lake, looking at the swimming goldfish.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢走在湖边的石阶上，看着里面的金鱼游来游去。

sentences.english: Uh-oh, another goldfish bit the dust-how do we break it to the kids?
sentences.chinese: 噢，又一条金鱼咽气了，我们该怎样对孩子们解释呢？

sentences.english: Even now during my part-time, I drew some goldfish for pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 闲暇时光有时会拿起画笔，画金鱼玩。

sentences.english: The breed is only one in a gallery of bizarre variations of the common goldfish.
sentences.chinese: 这个品种的金鱼，只是普通金鱼众多的奇异变种之一。

sentences.english: The breed is only one in a gallery of bizarre variations of the common goldfish.
sentences.chinese: 这个品种的金鱼，只是普通金鱼众多的奇异变种之一。

sentences.english: Snapdragons, calceolaria and larkspur will drop their floret rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 金鱼草，蒲包花和翠雀花的小花迅速脱落。

sentences.english: Actually, the new tenants turned out to be nine little goldfish.
sentences.chinese: 原来呀，新“房客”是小金鱼。

sentences.english: The purification ability of Elodea Canadensis Michx is higher than those of Potamogeton Crispus Linn and Ceratophyllum Demersum Linn.
sentences.chinese: 伊乐藻对水体的净化能力高于菹草和金鱼藻。

sentences.english: We might also be in some giant goldfish bowl.
sentences.chinese: 我们很可能处在一个巨大的金鱼缸中。

sentences.english: Antirrhinum majus to create flower jewelry brands.
sentences.chinese: “金鱼草”全力打造花饰品知名品牌。

sentences.english: Goldfish are very attractive when they swim in aquariums or fish bowls .
sentences.chinese: 金鱼在水族箱或鱼缸里游动时十分漂亮。

sentences.english: I think we all are in a fish tank, God are playing us.
sentences.chinese: 我想，我们全都在一个金鱼缸里面，上帝在玩大家呢。

sentences.english: There are one goldfish and two octopuses in the pond.
sentences.chinese: 在水池里有一条金鱼和两只章鱼。

definition: Yuchi or Yuchih township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
